author: Thomas
content:
Congrats to your new toy! I'm just trying to catch up with your blog - and I've been enjoying the photos quite a bit! Smooooth bokeh... and I like the very clear distinction between main subject and "all the rest" that the lens tends to produce.

I was wondering: do you ever manage to schlepp around ALL your lenses? Or do you need a whellbarrow for that? ðŸ˜‰

PS.: You've stolen the poor Katherine an "e"
